data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Agra to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Agra words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Agra, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
There are 4,418,800 people living in the county of Agra. Only about 48,607 might be believers.
Father, please give the people in the county of Agra access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
